mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productoption (product_id, option_key_id, created_date, created_id, updated_date, updated_id) VALUES (#{productId}, #{optionKeyId}, NOW(), #{createdId}, NOW(), #{updatedId})
mapper.select: SELECT po.product_id AS productId, ok.option_key_name AS optionType, ov.option_value_name AS optionValue, pov.stock, pov.extra_fee AS extraFee FROM productoptionvalue pov JOIN productoption po ON pov.product_id = po.product_id JOIN optionvalue ov ON pov.option_value_id = ov.option_value_id JOIN optionkey ok ON ov.option_key_id = ok.option_key_id WHERE po.product_id = #{productId} AND ok.option_key_name = #{optionType} AND ov.option_value_name = #{optionValue}
